mutants.code:
def count_sorted_substrings(s: str) -> int:
    n = len(s)
    (res, i, c) = (0, 1, 1)
    while i < n:
        if s[i - 1] > s[i]:
            res += c * (c + 1) >> 1
            c = 0
        c += 1
        i += 1
    res -= c * (c + 1) >> 1
    return res
